mapper.select: select t.* from(select * from coupon where coupon_endDate > sysdate() and coupon_quantity > 0 and coupon_deleted='n' order by creDate DESC) t limit 5 offset #{offset}
select count(*) from coupon where coupon_endDate > sysdate() and coupon_quantity > 0 and coupon_deleted='n'
select count(*) from coupon where coupon_endDate < sysdate() or coupon_quantity = 0 or coupon_deleted='y'
mapper.insert: insert into coupon (couponId, coupon_name, coupon_quantity, coupon_range, couponDiscountRate, beginDate, endDate, coupon_startDate, coupon_endDate) values(#{couponId}, #{coupon_name}, #{coupon_quantity}, #{coupon_range}, #{couponDiscountRate}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{coupon_startDate}, #{coupon_endDate})
mapper.update: update coupon set coupon_deleted = 'y' where couponId = #{couponId}

update coupon set coupon_name = #{coupon_name}, coupon_range = #{coupon_range}, coupon_quantity=#{coupon_quantity},couponDiscountRate=#{couponDiscountRate}, beginDate=#{beginDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, coupon_startDate = #{coupon_startDate}, coupon_endDate = #{coupon_endDate} where couponId = #{couponId} where couponId = #{couponId}
